column5: Hey Guys, I'm in the market for a good 20 ga. shotgun.  Can anybody recommend a gun shop in the North Bay area that has good prices.  I'd even be willing to consider a used gun if in great condition.  Thanks

look up the gun you want online.  price it at lebarons, bps etc.  then look up the local shops to see if they match it.  its a bit of a drive but elwood epps on hwy 11 is a good shop, big selection.  check the big wholesalers in alberta they will ship to you.  the largest used site out there is canadiangunnutz.com and should give you an idea on used prices.  happy shopping!
Luc, PM me I have a buddy in Sundridge who can probably help you out.

selling my 12g? mossberg 500 with Knoxx stock, 21 inch smooth bore SLUG barrel and 28in with 3 accu choke inserts. email for pics   asking 500 250 for the gun 150 for the knoxx stock 100 for the spare barrel

lebarons would be my suggestion, I bought a 20ga browning bps from them last year, got it quickly and the price was the best I could find.  As far as I know there isn't much in North Bay and what there is is really pricey.
PM Sent   Cool, I'll check them out.  Thanks guys
